review: Very detailed and specific approach by the doctor to address the ailment for my son. In my case it was skin and gastro related for my 9 week old son and he patiently explained the reason in depth, made us understand and gave the right prescription for the same. Highly recommended pediatrician to have video/remote consulting for your child in these times of lockdown in the covid pandemic situation. Attitude of the doctor was friendly and genuine and we felt at ease and felt better post the consultation online with him. 5 star rating fron our end.
Doctor is explaining everything in a clean and neat manner, and he is also extremely kind and polite, therefore I personally suggest this doctor to everyone. Thank you so much, Srinivas sir.
No staff to direct where to meet doctor. Unhelpful staff. No response when asked where to go. High wait time

Very friendly Dr. 
Checking thoroughly each aspects. Explained well. 
Very much satisfied with his consultation.
**** ******... goes through the history well and makes his points well and keeps rge discussion simple.

review: He is having so much of patience what a doctor requires,he treats my son very well when he is not feeling well.

Visited as my  1 year 2 months baby had fever.The doctor was friendly and listened to the issues very  patiently and also answered my queries. The clinic is very clean and hygienic.Would surely recommend.
